.b-grid-subgrid-left.title: Left region
.b-grid-subgrid-left.content: Columns configured with region: 'left' are displayed in this SubGrid

.b-grid-subgrid-normal.title: Scheduler
.b-grid-subgrid-normal.content: Scheduler occupies the entire middle SubGrid (it has region : 'normal' by default

.b-grid-subgrid-right.title: Right region
.b-grid-subgrid-right.content: Columns configured with region: 'right' are displayed in this SubGrid
